maqras.text: 100|9|Si najane neki ye, kabarata yi ache seya ut'thita ha’ba
100|10|Arau antarata yi ache seya prakasita ha’ba
100|11|niscaya sihamtara pratipalaka se'idina sihamtara arastha samparke sabisesa arahita.
101|1|Bhitiprada maha bipada.
101|2|Bhitiprada maha bipada ki
101|3|bhitiprada maha bipada samparke tumi ki jana
101|4|se'idina manuha ha’ba biksipta kita-patangara darae.
101|5|Arau parbatasamuha ha’ba dhuna rangina unara darae.
101|6|Eteke yara tarjusamuha gadhura ha’ba
101|7|te'om thakiba santosajanaka jiranata
101|8|arau yara tarjusamuha patala ha’ba
101|9|tara thikana ha’ba ‘ha-raiyaha’.
101|10|Arau tumi ki jana se'itono ki
101|11|i eta atyanta uttapta agnikunda.
102|1|Praacuryara pratiyogitaya tomalokaka amanoyogi karai raakhiche.
102|2|Yetiyalaike tomaloke kabarata upanita nohoraa.
102|3|Ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba.
102|4|Akau ketiya'o nahaya, ati sonakale tomaloke janibalai paba.
102|5|Ketiya'o nahaya, yadi tomaloke niscitabharae janilahemtena.
102|6|Niscaya tomaloke jahima (jahannama) dekhiba.
102|7|Akau, niscaya tomaloke iyaka patiyana yoraakai dekhiba.
102|8|Tara pichata se'idina arasya'i tomalokaka niyamata samparke prasna karaa ha’ba.
103|1|Samayara sapata
103|2|niscaya manuha ksatigrasthatata nipatita
103|3|kintu te'omlokara bahirae, yisakale imana aniche arau satkama karaiche lagate (yisakale) parasparaka satyara upadesa diye arau dhairya dharana karaibalai utsaha diye.
104|1|Durbhoga pratyeka se'i byaktira babe yiye sanmukhata arau anupasthitita paraninda karae.
104|2|Yiye sampada jama karae arau barae barae ganana karae.
104|3|Si dharana karae ye, tara sampade taka cirajirai karai raakhiba.
104|4|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya si hutamata niksipta ha’ba.
104|5|Arau tumi janane, hutama ki
104|6|i allahara prajbalita ju'i.
104|7|Yiye hrdapindaka graasa karaiba.
104|8|Niscaya i sihamtaka arad'dha karai raakhiba.
104|9|Okha okha stambhasamuhata.
105|1|Tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake hatira adhipatisakalara lagata ki karaichila
105|2|te'om sihamtara sarhayantra byarthatata paryabasita karaa na'ine
105|3|Arau sihamtara biraud'dhe te'om jake jake caraa'i pathi'oraa nachilane
105|4|yisakale sihamtara oparata paka tana matira silaguti niksepa karaichila
105|5|phalata te'om sihamtaka bhaksita trna-sadrsa karaichila.
106|1|Yihetu kburaa'ichasakala abhyasta
106|2|sita arau graismakalara bhramanata sihamtara asakti ache.
106|3|Eteke sihamte yena e'i gharara pratipalakara ibadata karae.
106|4|Yijane sihamtaka ksudha arasthata khadya pradana karaiche arau santraasara paraa niraapatta diche.
107|1|Tumi taka dekhichane yiye hicapa pratidanaka asbikara karae
107|2|si se'ijane'i, yiye anathaka kathorabharae khedi pathiyaya
107|3|arau si dukhiyaka khana khuraabalai utsaha nidiye.
107|4|Eteke dhbansa se'ibidha chalata adayakaraisakalara
107|5|yisakale nijara chalatata amanoyogi
107|6|yisakale anaka dekhuraabalaihe karae
107|7|arau sarau-suraa grhasamagrai pradanata badha diye.
108|1|Niscaya ami tomaka ala-ka'uchara pradana karaichom.
108|2|Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara uddesye chalata adaya karaa arau korabani karaa.
108|3|Niscaya tomara prati bidbesa posanakaraiye'i nirbansa.
109|1|Koraa, ‘he kaphirasakala
109|2|tomaloke yara ibadata karaa, ma'i tara ibadata nakaraom
109|3|arau ma'i yara ibadata karaom, tomaloke te'omra ibadatakarai nahaya
109|4|arau ma'i tara ibadatakarai nahaya yara ibadata tomaloke karaa.
109|5|Arau ma'i yara ibadata karaom tomaloke'o tara ibadatakarai nahaya.
109|6|Tomalokara dbina tomalokara babe, arau mora dbina mora babe.
110|1|Yetiya allahara sahaya arau bijaya ahiba
110|2|arau tumi manuhaka dale dale allahara dbinata praraesa karaote dekhiba
110|3|tetiya tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansasaha te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaiba arau te'omra ocarata ksama praarthana karaiba, niscaya te'om ta'oba grahanakarai.
111|1|Dhbansa ha'oka abu lahabara duyo hata arau si nije'o dhbansa haiche.
111|2|Tara dhana-sampada arau tara uparjana tara kono kamata nahila.
111|3|Atisighrae'i si lelihana ju'ita patita ha’ba.
111|4|Arau tara strai'o- yijaniye indhana bahana karae
111|5|Ta'ira dinita thakiba pakoraa tana rachi.
112|1|Koraa, ‘te'om allaha, eka-adbitiya
112|2|allaha haiche chamada; (te'om karao mukhapeksi nahaya, sakalo te'omrae'i mukhapeksi)
112|3|te'om kako janma diya na'i arau teraom janma loraa na'i
112|4|arau te'omra samatulya kono na'i’.
113|1|Koraa, ma'i asraya bicarao usara pratipalakara.
113|2|Te'om yi srsti karaiche tara anistara paraa
113|3|arau raatira andhakarara anistara paraa, yetiya i gabhira haya
113|4|arau se'isakala naraira anistara paraa yisakale gamthita phum diye
113|5|arau hinsukara anistara paraa, yetiya si hinsa karae.
114|1|Koraa- ma'i manuhara pratipalakara asraya praarthana karaichom
114|2|manuhara adhipatira
114|3|manuhara ilahara ocarata
114|4|atmagopanakarai kumantranadatara anistara paraa
114|5|yiye manuhara manata kumantrana diye
114|6|jinara majara paraa arau manuhara majara paraa.
